item.title: Blogging with Hugo & gh-pages
item.description: Having been working as a software developer for over a year, I finally started this blog for the good habit of taking notes along the way of learning. Goals This initial post will walk through the steps of: Setting up Hugo for local development and post drafting Hosting your source code on Github, and your static site generated on the gh-pages branch Use Github Actions to automate your Hugo build and deployment.
